channel.title: Embeeding on Yuanye Ma's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Embeeding on Yuanye Ma's Blog

item.title: uboot
item.author: yuanye.ma@qq.com (Yuanye Ma)
item.description: uboot make xxx_defconfig Top Makefile : %config 依赖 scripts_basic $(Q)$(MAKE) $(build)=scripts/basic $(build) 定义在 scripts/Kbuild.include中 build := -f $(srctree)/scripts/Makefile.build obj 即 命令展开为 @ make -f $(srctree)/scripts/Makefile.build obj=scripts/basic 编译生成了 scripts/basic/fixdep outputmakefile FORCE 命令 $(Q)$(MAKE) $(build)=scripts/kconfig $@ 展开

item.title: 基于Ubuntu进行STM32程序开发
item.author: yuanye.ma@qq.com (Yuanye Ma)
item.description: 基于Ubuntu进行STM32程序开发 platform info Ubuntu version : Ubuntu 20.04.1 LTS 正点原子 STM32f767 阿波罗开发板 st-link version : v1.6.1-201-g4bfaab0 openocd version : 0.10.0 Cross Compiler : gcc-arm-none-eabi (9.2.1 20191025 release) install stlink driver sudo apt install libusb-1.0-0-dev gcc build-essential cmake libusb-1.0-0 git clone https://github.com/texane/stlink.git cd stlink make
